INSERT INTO sys_org_manager_cache (org_id, user_id, user_name, role_type, org_level, customer_id, is_active) SELECT uo.org_id, uo.user_id, u.user_name, CASE WHEN uo.principal = '1' THEN 'manager' WHEN uo.supervisor = '1' THEN 'supervisor' ELSE 'manager' END as role_type, COALESCE(org.level, 0) as org_level, COALESCE(org.customer_id, #{customerId}) as customer_id, CASE WHEN u.status = '0' AND uo.is_deleted = 0 AND org.status = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as is_active FROM sys_user_org uo INNER JOIN sys_user u ON uo.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN sys_org_units org ON uo.org_id = org.id WHERE uo.org_id = #{orgId} AND org.customer_id = #{customerId} AND uo.is_deleted = 0 AND u.is_deleted = 0 AND org.is_deleted = 0 AND (uo.principal = '1' OR uo.supervisor = '1');
